definitions.title: vb. cover
definitions.body: (NH [[כָּסָה]] Pi; Aram. [[כְּסָא]] chiefly Pa; kso0 Pa. hide, cover; ksoyo0 covering, 0etksiyto0 garment; Ar. kasa0 (ksw) clothe, kisa0’un garment; As. kusû, cover: kusîtu, garment Dl:HWB 342)—
pass. (cstr.) [[כְּסוּי חֲטָאָה]] Ps 32:1 covered in respect of sin (by God, which he thus puts out of sight) (‖[[נְשׂוּי־פֶּשַׁע]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נִכְסָָתָּה]], covered, with waves Je 51:42; Inf. cstr. [[הִכָּסוֹת]] Ez Eze 24:8, (blood) not to be covered.

cover, clothe Ju Jdg 4:19, Ez Eze 16:10 (2 acc.), v:Eze 16:18; Jon 3:6 is appar. reflex., c. acc. of garment (strange; rd. perh. [[וַיִּכָּס]]); nakedness Ge 9:23 (J), Ex 28:42 (P), Ez Eze 16:8, Ho 2:11; the naked Is 58:7, Ez Eze 18:7, Eze 18:16 (+ acc. rei); the face and legs of seraphim Is 6:2, Is 6:2; bodies of cherubim Ez Eze 1:11, Eze 1:23, Eze 1:23; the face Ge 38:15 (J), Ez Eze 12:6, Eze 12:12, fig. Job 23:17; earth with the great deep Ps 104:6; heavens with glory Hab 3:3; with [[בְּ]] of the clothing Ge 38:14 (J), De 22:12, these two appar. reflex., cf. Jon 3:6 supr.; Ju Jdg 4:18, 1Ki 1:1; heaven with clouds Ps 147:8, with glory Ez Eze 32:7.

cover, conceal blood Ge 37:26 (J), Job 16:18; human ordure De 23:14; mts. conceal men from God Ho 10:8; cover transgressions Job 31:33, Pr 17:9, Pr 28:13; iniquity Ps 32:5; righteousness Ps 40:11; hatred Pr 10:18; a thing Pr 11:13; face of judge so that he cannot see justice Job 9:24; rulers and seers Is 29:10; with [[בְּ]] of covering Le 17:13 (H), 1Sa 19:13; face by fat Job 15:27; sun by a cloud Ez Eze 32:7; with [[מִן]] from whom Ge 18:17 (J), Job 33:17.

cover (with covering of protection), a pit Ex 21:33 (Covt. code); with cloud of incense, the Kapporeth Le 16:13 (P); coverings of the sacred tent, tabernacle, and their furniture Ex 26:13, Nu 4:9, Nu 4:15 (P); with [[בְּ]] of the covering Nu 4:5, Nu 4:8, Nu 4:11, Nu 4:12 (P); Zion [[בְּחֵל יׇדִי]] Is 51:16.

cover, spread over, fat, the inwards Ex 29:13, Ex 29:22, Le 3:3, Le 3:9, Le 3:14, Le 4:8 (with [[עַל]]), Le 7:3 (P); leprosy, the skin and flesh Le 13:12, Le 13:13 (P); the cloud of the theophany, the mount Ex 24:15, Ex 24:16 (P), the tent of meeting Ex 40:34, Nu 17:7 (P), and the tabernacle Nu 9:15, Nu 9:16 (P); altar with tears Mal 2:13 (2 acc.); Jerusalem with multitude of camels Is 60:6; of handiwork 1Ki 7:18, 1Ki 7:41, 1Ki 7:42 = 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:13.

cover, overwhelm, sq. accus., the sea the Egyptians Ex 14:28 (P), Ex 15:5, Ex 15:10 (song), Jos 24:7 (E), Ps 78:53 Ps 106:11; waters Job 22:11, Job 38:34, Ps 104:9, Je 46:8, Ez Eze 26:19; locusts the eye of the land Ex 10:5, Ex 10:15 (J), also Israel Nu 22:5, Nu 22:11 (J); frogs the land Ex 8:2 (P); quails the camp Ex 16:13 (P); cloud the land Ez Eze 30:18, Eze 38:9, Eze 38:16; darkness the earth Is 60:2; dust a city Ez Eze 26:10; the depths of the sea by God Job 36:30; with a reference to a person's shame Ps 44:16, Ps 69:8, Je 51:51, Ob:Ob 10, Mic 7:10; horror Ps 55:6, Ez Eze 7:18; violence Pr 10:6, Pr 10:11, Hb Hab 2:17; confusion Je 3:25; mischief Ps 140:10; God covers sin Ps 85:3 (‖[[נשׂא עון]]), cf. Ps 32:1 (Qal).

sq. [[על]] of person or thing covered, cover over: cherubim over the ark 2Ch 5:8; over the dead, the earth Nu 16:33 (JE), Ps 106:17, Is 26:21, worms Job 21:26; dust over blood Ez Eze 24:7; waters over the sea Hb Hab 2:14, cf. [[לַיׇּם]] Is 11:9; (v. Dr:§ 135. 7 Obs.); love covereth over all sins Pr 10:12; God covereth over iniquity Ne 3:37; people not to cover over a guilty person De 13:9; + acc. of obj. covering (Da:Synt. § 75), fig. covering over the garment with violence Mal 2:16; God's hands with light Job 36:32; + [[בְּ]] of covering Ps 44:20. Note.—[[כִסִּתִי]] ([[אֵלֶיְ]] ) Ps 143:9 is error for [[חָסִיתִי]] acc. to LXX kate/fugon SS, but [[חסה]] not cstr. wi. [[אֶל־]]; [[חִכִּיתִי]] Bae; [[הֶאֱבַלְתִּי כִּסֵּתִי עָלָיו אֶת־תְּהוֹם]] Ez Eze 31:15 acc. to Co I caused the deep to mourn for them (del. [[כסתי]]).
sq. accus. be covered, hills with shadow Ps 80:11; mountains with water Ge 7:19, Ge 7:20 (P); field with nettles Pr 24:31; abs., windows of temple Ez Eze 41:16.
sq. [[בְּ]], be clothed, with sackcloth 1Ch 21:16; name with darkness Ec 6:4.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְכַּס]] Is 37:1 = 2Ki 19:1; 3 fs. [[תִּכַּסֶּה]] Pr 26:26; [[וַתִּתְכָָּס]] Ge 24:65; pl. [[יִתְכַּסּוּ]] Is 59:6, Jon 3:8; Pt. [[מִתְכַּסֶּה]] 1Ki 11:29; pl. [[מִתְכַּסִּים]] Is 37:2 = 2Ki 19:2; —cover, clothe oneself, abs. (of veil) Ge 24:65 (J); with [[בְּ]], of new garment 1Ki 11:29; sackcloth 2Ki 19:1, 2Ki 19:2 = Is 37:1, Is 37:2; fig. of works Is 59:6, of hatred with guile Pr 26:26; with acc. Jon 3:5 ([[שַׂקִּים]]).
